HGTX3.SA.summary: Cia. Hering, together with its subsidiaries, produces and markets threads, fabrics, knitwear, textiles, and clothing products in Brazil and Internationally. It offers its products primarily under the Hering, Hering Kids, and DZARM. brand names through retail, franchise, own, and web stores. The company operates 778 stores. Cia. Hering was founded in 1880 and is headquartered in Blumenau, Brazil.
